title: Collapsible UI Pattern for Filter Groups
details:
Space-efficient accordion UI implementation:
- Hidden checkbox input controls expand/collapse state via CSS :checked selector
- Group header is <label> for the checkbox (clickable to toggle)
- Group content uses max-height transition (0 when collapsed, 500px when expanded)
- Icon rotation on expand using CSS transform (90deg when checked)
- Group action buttons (Select All/Deselect All) use event.stopPropagation() to prevent toggle
- Data attributes (data-filter, data-action, data-category) for JavaScript event delegation
- Benefit: No JavaScript needed for expand/collapse animation, pure CSS solution
- Accessibility: Native checkbox semantics, keyboard navigable
